rows.label: tev001501_MSG0001
rows.name:
And what do you want, mmm? Have you found a
mission that pays enough to be worth my time?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001501_MSG0002
rows.name: If so, I'm all ears. All. Ears.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001501_MSG0003
rows.name:
But if you've simply come here to chat, I can't promise
that you'll live to hear the end of our conversation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001501_MSG1001
rows.name: Ah, [ST:playername ]. Pleasure.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001501_MSG1002
rows.name:
I was just thinking about how much I'd enjoy working
with a big strong BLADE like yourself again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001501_MSG1003
rows.name: No, no! I mean it. You really should take me along.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001501_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001501_SEL0011
rows.name: Add the Murderess to your team.

rows.label: tev001501_JNK0020
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001501_SEL0021
rows.name: Decline the Murderess's request for now.

rows.label: tev001501_MSG1004
rows.name:
Wonderful. Oh, and relax. I promise not to shoot you
in the back or anything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001501_MSG1005
rows.name:
Well, that's a bummer. And here I thought I might
actually get a decent payday for once.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001501_MSG1010
rows.name:
What? You're going to an infamously dangerous
region just to reclaim some old alien mech?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001501_MSG1011
rows.name: Pass. I don't see the profit in it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001501_MSG1016
rows.name: So Little Miss Sweetness is in trouble, eh?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001501_MSG1017
rows.name:
Well, I'm certainly no fan of people being killed by the
Ganglion, so if you're going to save her, I'll chip in.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001501_JNK0070
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001501_SEL0071
rows.name: Add the Murderess to your team.

rows.label: tev001501_JNK0080
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001501_SEL0081
rows.name: Decline the Murderess's request for now.

rows.label: tev001501_MSG1018
rows.name:
Let's get going. I'll never be able to cash in on favors
from her if she dies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001501_MSG1019
rows.name:
Well, that's a shame. I thought it would be an easy
way to put her in my debt.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001501_MSG1024
rows.name:
If you're going to Sylvalum, there's a good chance you
might find some undiscovered treasures.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001501_MSG1025
rows.name:
Hmm... You know, if you need a hand, I suppose I'd
be willing to accompany you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001501_JNK0090
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001501_SEL0091
rows.name: Add the Murderess to your team.

rows.label: tev001501_JNK0100
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001501_SEL0101
rows.name: Decline the Murderess's request for now.

rows.label: tev001501_MSG1026
rows.name:
Perfect! Oh, and I hope you understand that if I'm
going to such a dangerous place, I'll need a reward
commensurate with my efforts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001501_MSG1027
rows.name: My, aren't we cocky! Well, I'll overlook it this once.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001501_MSG1032
rows.name:
How's that? You received another mission straight from
Vandham? My my my, aren't we a big shot?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001501_MSG1033
rows.name:
I don't know what it entails, but I'm sure Vandham
rewards you well for these sweetheart deals of his.
So count me IN![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001501_JNK0110
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001501_SEL0111
rows.name: Add the Murderess to your team.

rows.label: tev001501_JNK0120
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001501_SEL0121
rows.name: Decline the Murderess's request for now.

rows.label: tev001501_MSG1034
rows.name:
Heh heh heh. If I complete this mission, I'll demand
Vandham put me on the sweetheart job track too![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001501_MSG1035
rows.name: Shame. We'd have made such a lucrative team.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001501_MSG1040
rows.name:
Who knows what a man like that is thinking?
Or what he'll do next?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001501_MSG1041
rows.name:
He needs to be removed from the picture before he can
do something else foolish.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001501_JNK0130
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001501_SEL0131
rows.name: Add the Murderess to your team.

rows.label: tev001501_JNK0140
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001501_SEL0141
rows.name: Decline the Murderess's request for now.

rows.label: tev001501_MSG1042
rows.name: Nice. I'll go sharpen my killin' blade.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001501_MSG1043
rows.name:
Without me, is Team Goody Two-shoes really equipped
to do what needs to be done to that man?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001501_MSG1048
rows.name:
No matter how much money you hoard,
you still need to be alive to spend it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001501_MSG1049
rows.name:
So it's imperative that we complete this mission.
...That's WE. Not you and someone else. We.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001501_JNK0150
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001501_SEL0151
rows.name: Add the Murderess to your team.

rows.label: tev001501_JNK0160
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001501_SEL0161
rows.name: Decline the Murderess's request for now.

rows.label: tev001501_MSG1051
rows.name:
Does finding the Lifehold Core take us closer to heaven
or hell? I can't wait to find out![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001501_MSG1052
rows.name:
Hmm. Well then, good luck. Oh, and make sure you
succeed, okay? Because if you don't...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001501_MSG1053
rows.name: ...I'll find you in hell and kill you again. Ta-ta![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001501_MSG1058
rows.name:
The war is over, and the attention of Mira's inhabitants
has turned back to the accumulation of wealth.
It's about damn time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001501_MSG1059
rows.name:
And you better BELIEVE I'm getting in on the action.
So take me with you already![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001501_JNK0170
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: tev001501_SEL0171
rows.name: Add the Murderess to your team.

rows.label: tev001501_JNK0180
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev001501_SEL0181
rows.name: Decline the Murderess's request for now.

rows.label: tev001501_MSG1060
rows.name:
Good. For my part, I'll see to it that any fools who
stand in our way are expediently removed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev001501_MSG1061
rows.name: Shame. We'd have made such a lucrative team.[ST:wait ]
